name: Voyage Plus
author: RewindCreation

sections.description:
Voyage Plus was created to incorporate theme-independent features:

  • Ad Unit Shortcode: [ad]
  • Reponsive Grid Columns shortcode that strickly follows grid system: [column]
  • Post Content Shortcode: [post-content]
  • action hooks to wp_head() and wp_footer()

Support is provided at support forums.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the voyageplus.zip.
  2. Upload the voyageplus folder to your /wp-content/plugins directory.
  3. Activate Voyage Plus in Plugin section
sections.faq:
Why was this plugin created?

To provide theme-independent features as a companion to Themes developed by RewindCreation

Where can I get supports?

http://rewindcreation.com/support/

short_description: Voyage+ is a companion to Voyage Theme. It provides theme-independent features such as shortcodes, action hooks, etc.
